summary: Adds unique dogs and wolves to various Jarl\'s Palaces across Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


                                                                A Jarl\'s Best Friend(JBF)
								Version 1.1
								By Colorthemap


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Introduction: I liked how the Jarl of Markarth had hunting dogs that simply roamed around his keep, being dogs.  But I wondered why didn\'t the other
Jarl\'s have something similar?  It would be accurate, hunting would make sense as a leasurly activity for at least some people around the keep.
So I did it, added dogs to the rest of the Jarls\' palaces.

All dogs treat the Jarl as allies and everyone else in the keep as friends.  They simply roam around, eat sleep and do dog things.  You know... the works.

Dog list:

Winterhold Jarl\'s Longhouse - Hugo
Dawnstar The White Hall - Stendarr
Riften Mistveil Keep - Noble
Falkreath Jarl\'s Longhouse - Heiko
Whiterun Dragonsreach - Eagle
Windhelm Palace of Kings - Brave
Solitude Blue Palace - Torygg
Morthal Highmoon Hall - Juniper
Markarth Understone Keep - Same as Vanilla 

Wolf List:

Winterhold Jarl\'s Longhouse: Magda and Aldo
Windhelm Palace of Kings: Baikal
Dawnstar The White Hall - Neda and Gunnar
Riften Mistveil Keep - Kaiser
Falkreath Jarl\'s Longhouse - Frieda
Whiterun Dragonsreach - Nissa and Ernst
Solitude Blue Palace - None, as per request.
Morthal Highmoon Hall - Ulra and Godfrey
Markarth Understone Keep - Oscar and Vala 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

									Edition Guide

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Main Edition: Does as shown above, no extensions.
Essential Dogs Edition: Simple, it makes all of the dogs essential.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------				

								Installation


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Easy way: Press the download with manager button, life is simple.  (If you don\'t have the manager get it here:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager/)

Note:  I am in no way affiliated with the Nexus or its manager, I do however endorse its use.

Hard(er) way: 
1) Copy the contents of the data folder into your Skyrim data folder.(Example Location: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data)
2) Startup the Skyrim launcher.
3) Click Data Files.
4) Check the box next to Jarls_BestFriend.esp

Done!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------					

								Uninstallation


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
With Manager: Deactivate and the press button with red X.


Witout Manager: Delete the following file(s) in your Skyrim Data folder:
	-Jarls_BestFriend.esp

Done!



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------					

								Version History

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1.1:
- Increased the wander radius for all the dogs, should give them a more realistic AI.
- Increased the ai energy of all the dogs, should give them a more realistic AI.
- Fixed Hugo\'s relations he will now defend everyone in the palace.
- Changed wolfrace in game to allow the creature\'s name to appear.  Should not effect anything else in the game world, if it does let me know.
- Added wolves that guard various thrones as per request by Batlatan on the Nexus.  Note: This is all they do, think of it as their training.
- Increased the strength of dogs to make them more of a court asset and less of a decoration.
- Fixed slight on my part which made dogs attack the player if one got to close to them.
- Few dog location changes, you should not even notice it, this is for pathing and such to allow the wolves to stay stationary.



	
1.0: Initial Release

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
								

								 To-DO


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Priority guide:
High - Next release
Medium - Within next two releases
Low - When I have time for it.


1) Make dogs rewards for becoming the thane of select holds.  They would be given to the player like a housecarl is, or in a similar manner.(High Priority)
2) When a new Jarl is added to one of the holds in Skyrim via the Civil war Quest line the dog stays aboard.  This will be addressed later.(Medium Priority)
3) Add dogs to other locations such as Rorikstead and Castle Dour.(Medium Priority)
4) Add in any other requests, make as many as you see fit.(As they come)
5)Fix any further reported bugs.(As they come)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
								

					Sources Used/ Credits(Excuse me if this sounds like a awards show acceptance speech.)


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1) Bethesda for making this game, and the entire Elder Scrolls series, as well as opening up both their lore and game to the public.
2) The wonderful Creation Kit, without it this mod would not exist.(CreationKit.com)
	1a) As well as the tutorials that came along with it.
3) UESP for being a massive lore database as well as an archive of all places and NPCs Skyrim.  Very helpful (uesp.net)
4) The countless other mods for inspiring the idea in me that I could make some of my own.
5) Whoever came up with the naming conventions for dog mods, I salute you.
6) The Dog Pet Names and Meanings website(s for, hopefully, giving \"better names.\"  This is in response to the request by JoePozlander. (http://pets.htmlplanet.com/categ/male-german-nordic-and-russian.html and http://pets.htmlplanet.com/categ/girl-german-nordic-and-russian.html)
7) Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack for the textures seen in the screenshots. (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3621)
8) Zazzlefrast my noble tester who at least pretended to enjoy it.
9) Everyone who made requests you really help shape this mod.
10) All of you who download and/or endorse this file it really helps.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
								

								Reccomended Mods


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Here is a list of mod(s) that should enhance my mod, I recommend any one with my mod use these:

1) Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack - This mod is the reason for the nice dog/wolf textures in the screenshots.  Use it. (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3621)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
								

								License 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This mod is given to you as is with no sort of warranty... ever.

You may redistribute, full or in part, and edit this mod as you wish but credit and this readme must be included in a human obtainable format.
author: Colorthemap

files.changelogHtml:
General dog AI tweaks
Added wolves that guard various thrones as per request by Batlatan on the Nexus.
Increased the strength of dogs.
Fixed slight on my part which made dogs attack the player if one got to close to them.
Few dog location changes.
